name: Mary Beelaerts van Blokland
body: Unique, Handy & Easy! I love this new platform for our European Arts, Culture, Crafts & Luxury!
function: Former Cultural City-Counseller, Le Vésinet (Paris), France

name: Douwe v. Hoytema
body:
Europe is Worldleader... in Arts, Culture, Handcrafs, Creativity & Luxury! No other country or region in the world can match with Europe!     
What Europe offers is UNIQUE...!
